attributes.action: Keep mask-wearing mandatory on public transport
attributes.additional_details:
The Government has the power to legislate to continue to make masks compulsory on public transport.
I feel many people will not continue to wear masks if the rule is relaxed, but will continue to do so if mandatory.
attributes.background: I believe we need to continue to wear masks in crowded indoor places in order to keep COVID numbers down, most importantly on public transport, which is enclosed, and which essential workers use to get to work.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Keep face covering mandatory in indoor public settings beyond 19th July 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590616

Keep mandatory face coverings in supermarkets and on public transport: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590836
 
Keep face masks mandatory for public transport after the lifting of restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590694

Keep requirement to wear a face covering in shops & supermarkets after July 19th: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590829
